p: The present randomized double-blind clinical trial was conducted at Hormozgan University of Medical Sciences, Bandar Abbas, Iran, from November 2017 to April 2018. The study was done by allocation ratio 1 : 1 and parallel groups. This trial was also approved by the Ethics Committee of the university (Ethics committee reference number: HUMS.REC.1394.012) based on the guidelines of the International Conference on Harmonization and the ethical principles originating in the Declaration of Helsinki. All data and final manuscript were reviewed and approved by all authors. The trial was registered in the Iranian Clinical Trials Registry with trial ID number IRCT2016072629026N2.
